node.statement: (Full interaction difference) Combining: DeltaV_eps = lambda integral [quartic shift] dx + delta_m_eps^2 integral [quadratic shift] dx = lambda integral [-4 psi_eps :phi_eps^3: + 6 psi_eps^2 :phi_eps^2: - 4 psi_eps^3 phi_eps + psi_eps^4] dx + delta_m_eps^2 integral [-2 psi_eps phi_eps + psi_eps^2] dx. Grouping by degree in phi: (Cubic) -4 lambda integral psi_eps :phi_eps^3: dx; (Quadratic) 6 lambda integral psi_eps^2 :phi_eps^2: dx; (Linear) -4 lambda <psi_eps^3, phi_eps> - 2 delta_m_eps^2 <psi_eps, phi_eps>; (Constant) lambda ||psi_eps||_4^4 + delta_m_eps^2 ||psi_eps||_2^2.
